scripts.start:gateway: cd ./api-gateway && npm install --no-audit --no-fund && npm run dev
scripts.start:frontend: cd ./frontend && npm install --no-audit --no-fund && npm run dev
scripts.build:frontend: cd ./frontend && npm install --no-audit --no-fund && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run start:mocks" "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.render:test-all: npm run render:test-gateway && npm run render:test-frontend
